### 0.0.1 - 12 November, 2012

### New features

- Cache compression settings. ([@rymai][])
- Cache query string caching settings. ([@rymai][])
- Cache query string logging settings. ([@rymai][])
- Cache management. ([@rymai][])
- Token-Based Authentication. ([@rymai][])
